Method Detail

getCampaigns

List<Campaign> getCampaigns(String accessToken,
                            Integer offset,
                            Integer limit)
Get a set of campaigns.

Parameters:
accessToken - Access token.
offset - Denotes the starting number for the result set.
limit - Denotes the number of results per set of result, limited to 50
Returns:
Returns a list of campaigns.

getCampaign

Campaign getCampaign(String accessToken,
                     String campaignId)
Get campaign details for a specific campaign.

Parameters:
accessToken - Access token.
campaignId - Campaign id.
Returns:
Returns a campaign.
